Sentencas: Doped ceria, which has a higher oxygen ion conductivity than yttria-stabilized zirconia, is one of the possible electrolytes for solid oxide fuel cell at low temperatures.
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method

Sentencas: This study concerns powder preparation and densification of rare-earth-doped ceria.
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method

Sentencas: Rare-earth-doped ceria powders with a composition of Ce0.8R0.2O1.9 (R = Yb, Y, Gd, Sm, Nd, and La) were prepared by heating the oxalate coprecipitate when a mixed rare earth/cerium nitrate solution was added to an oxalic solution.
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method

Sentencas: The oxalate and derived-oxide powders were characterized by x-ray diffraction (XRD), thermogravimetry differential thermal analysis (TG-DTA), particle size analyzer with laser diffraction, inductively coupled plasma (ICP), transmission electron microscopy (TEM), and scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method

Sentencas: This method provided the oxalate solid solutions containing Ce and R, which were calcined to form the oxide solid solutions at 600 degrees C in air.
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method

Sentencas: The lattice parameter of oxide powders increased linearly with increasing ionic radius of doped rare earth.
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method

Sentencas: The size of platelike particles of oxalates and oxides depended on the concentration of oxalic acid and showed a minimum at 0.4 M oxalic acid.
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method

Sentencas: Dry milling of oxide powder with alpha-Al2O3 ball was effective in reducing the size and aspect ratios of particles with little contamination of Al2O3.
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method

Sentencas: These rare-earth-doped ceria powders with various sizes were formed by uniaxial pressing (49 MPa) followed by cold isostatic pressing (294 MPa), and sintered at 900-1600 degrees C in air for 4 h. The micrometer-sized-doped CeO2 powders were densified above 95% of the theoretical density at 1200 degrees C, The grain size of rare-earth-doped ceria after sintering at 1600 degrees C was larger in the samples with the larger rare-earth element.
Titulo: Synthesis and sintering of rare-earth-doped ceria powder by the oxalate coprecipitation method
